"I welcome the international fact-finding mission to investigate these serious human rights violations in Chechnya." - RM @RepEliotEngel

"I condemn the violence and brutality against the LGBTQI community, human rights defenders, & political critics in Chechnya. For far too long, Moscow has allowed its hand-picked government in Chechnya to commit grievous human rights violations." - RM @RepEliotEngel

It’s about time the Trump administration put more pressure on Putin-aligned human rights violators in Chechnya. We applaud @usosce for joining the coalition to invoke the Moscow Mechanism investigations.

Yesterday, the United States joined a coalition of 16 countries to invoke the “Moscow Mechanism,” triggering an @OSCE investigation into the highly disturbing human rights violations in Chechnya. It’s time for Russia to take accountability for these atrocities and heinous crimes.
